TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 建立管理元件之 物件集合的設計階段服務。

span.span: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of objects for components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責管理集合的元件在設計階段在表單上存在的每個執行個體的物件。The class is responsible for managing the collection of objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time. 這個類別可讓項目建立時直接推送模型，而且主要是用於設計階段工具開發人員，不過也可以使用由元件和自訂控制項開發人員。This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers. 設計階段工具開發人員必須決定要顯示的元件，並判斷當變更此清單的項目清單。Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes. 它們也可以建立增益集運作搭配智慧標籤面板物件。They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects. 進階開發人員可能需要以動態方式控制與元件相關聯的項目，因此取代或補充標準提取模型的元件。Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model. 比方說，可以改變面板命令，根據其使用和元件的設計階段狀態的內容。For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component. > [!NOTE] > 實際上是駕駛服務背後推送和提取模型; 不過，在後者的情況下，它會隱含地運作。The is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly. 提供直覺式的介面來存取及管理每個元件，包括下列方法和事件的項目： provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - 方法會判斷是否目前正在管理特定的元件。The method determines whether the is currently managing a particular component. - 方法支援的項目清單的列舉型別。The method supports the enumeration of the lists of items. - 方法可讓您可新增或元件執行個體的現有項目集。The method allows adding a or to the set of existing items for a component instance. 相反地，方法會移除一個或所有與元件相關聯的項目清單。In contrast, the method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component. > [!NOTE] > 方法代表直接的推入模式的控制台項目關聯的元件。The method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component. 相反地，提取模型依存於覆寫的設計工具類別，該元件的屬性。In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the property of the designer class for that component. 在設計環境會負責將這些項目加入至目前元件在設計介面上的建立時。The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current when a component is created on the design surface. > [!IMPORTANT] > ， ， ，和方法只會考慮，或影響推入模型的項目。The , , , and methods only consider or affect push-model items. - 事件表示元件的項目集合變更時。The event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component. 大規模的互通性，通常會建議使用的相同元件的設計階段的快顯功能表和其面板中的控制台項目部分，因為之間存在物件和設計工具動詞命令。Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between objects and designer verbs. 如果是元件設計工具未明確指定(也就是它不包含覆寫屬性)，則會建立清單，從現有的設計工具動詞命令。If a component designer does not explicitly specify a (that is, it does not contain an overridden property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs. 這些動詞由屬性。These verbs are specified by the property. 在此情況下，內部的動詞命令清單類別用來包含動詞命令包含項目面板項目的集合。In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries. 如果您想若要使用的面板項目和設計階段的快顯功能表項目，則您可以將`includeAsDesignerVerb`項目的建構函式中的參數。If you want a to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor. 使用以控制您的設計工具顯示。Use the to control the display of your designer's .

related.span: Windows Form 的設計工具命令和 DesignerAction 物件模型

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

span.span: The service provider for the current design-time environment.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所需的監視選項和元件變更服務提供者。A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes. 它預期支援和型別。It is expected to support the and types. 類別會使用內部資料表來管理元件和其相關聯智慧標籤。The class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated smart tags. 一般而言，元件開發人員不需要建立這個類別; 的執行個體相反地，它們可以取得現有的執行個體，透過呼叫方法。Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the method.

summary.span: 將一或多個 物件加入受管理智慧標籤的目前集合。

span.span: Adds one or more objects to the current collection of managed smart tags.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList actionList) cil managed
Public Sub Add (comp As IComponent, actionList As DesignerActionList)

param.name: comp
param.span: 智慧標籤要與其關聯的 。

span.span: The to associate the smart tags with.

param.name: actionList
param.span: 包含要加入之新智慧標籤項目的 。

span.span: The that contains the new smart tag items to be added.

summary.span: 將 加入受管理智慧標籤的目前集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法代表推送模型加入智慧標籤項目。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 替代的提取模型依存於覆寫之對應元件的設計工具中的屬性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 要加入的清單時呼叫這個方法時，會掃描任何具有屬性設定為`true`。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 這些項目會加入到此元件，透過呼叫的設計工具動詞命令清單方法。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 智慧標籤所管理的元件執行個體為基礎。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 受管理的集合可能包含重複的項目。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 這個方法會引發事件。This method raises the event.

exception.span: 其中一或二個參數都為 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放管理的所有元件並清除所有推入模型智慧標籤清單。

span.span: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清空內部資料表用來儲存相關的元件和其推入模型智慧標籤清單的資訊。The method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists. > [!CAUTION] > 因為這個方法會影響目前的服務所管理的所有元件並不只是目前的元件，應該謹慎使用這個方法。Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously. 一般而言，設計階段工具開發人員會使用它，重設的設計介面時。Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface. 元件開發人員應該使用其中一種方法改為移除個別的智慧標籤項目或清單中。Component developers should use one of the methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists. A先前由目前的服務每個元件都會引發事件。A event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.

related.span: Windows Form 的設計工具命令和 DesignerAction 物件模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

Public Function Contains (comp As IComponent) As Boolean

span.span: The to search for.

summary.span: 決定目前智慧標籤服務是否為指定元件管理動作清單。

span.span: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.

returns.span: 如果元件由目前服務管理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只會辨識推入模型智慧標籤，也就是與元件相關聯方法。The method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the method. 雖然沒有任何結構限制的並行數目設計階段工具所建立的執行個體，通常服務中的單一執行個體建立每個設計介面。Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.

summary.span: 發生於移除或加入任何元件的 時。

span.span: Occurs when a is removed or added for any component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的一組相關聯的特殊類別事件。The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the event. |特製化的型別Specialized type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||加入智慧標籤清單管理中的特定資訊。Adds information specific to smart tag list management. 這個類別特製化從。This class is specialized from .| ||連接與其處理常式。Connects the with its handler.| ||表示清單是否已加入或移除。Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是唯一的方法所託管的實作介面。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它會執行兩個主要動作：It performs two main actions: - 從設計環境，透過呼叫中的可用服務清單中移除目前的服務方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 從相關聯的元件變更的事件取消訂閱介面。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是唯一的方法所託管的實作介面。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它會執行兩個主要動作：It performs two main actions: - 從設計環境，透過呼叫中的可用服務清單中移除目前的服務方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 從相關聯的元件變更的事件取消訂閱介面。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 傳回與元件相關聯的智慧標籤項目清單集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

Public Function GetComponentActions (component As IComponent) As DesignerActionListCollection

param.name: component

span.span: The component that the smart tags are associated with.

summary.span: 傳回與元件相關聯的智慧標籤項目清單集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

returns.span: 指定之元件的智慧標籤集合。

span.span: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就相當於呼叫方法使用`type`參數。The method is equivalent to a call to the method using a `type` parameter of . 因此，傳回的集合會包含智慧標籤的推播及提取清單。Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags. 傳回會透過新增的項目清單的聯集方法，也列出取自取自元件的站台的執行個體。The returned is the union of item lists added through the methods and also the lists obtained from the instance obtained from the component's site.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的多載方法會篩選`type`參數，它可以有下列值之一。This version of the overloaded method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||所有相關聯的智慧標籤。All associated smart tags.| ||僅限提取模型智慧標籤。Pull-model smart tags only.| ||僅限推入模型智慧標籤。Push-model smart tags only.| 如果相關聯的設計工具元件未提供提取模型智慧標籤清單中，則方法將改為使用設計工具的設計階段的快顯功能表項目從屬性。If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the property.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 擷取與元件相關聯的提取模型智慧標籤。

span.span: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是協助程式方法方法。The method is a helper method for the methods. 搜尋提取模型智慧標記型別的，然後將這些檔案來提供`actionLists`集合。 searches for pull-model smart tags of type , and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection. 如果元件的開發人員未明確提供透過智慧標籤的集合其設計工具屬性，這個方法會重複使用的設計階段的快顯功能表項目，取得透過屬性設計工具。If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the property of the designer.

span.span: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法通常由設計工具開發人員，因為元件開發人員通常不知道其他元件存在於目前的設計空間。This version of the method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space. 如果成功，這個方法會引發事件。If successful, this method raises the event.
